prompts.text: What is Cognito user pool id?
What is Cognito id pool id?
What is Cognito web client id?

prompts.command: appshake set VUE_APP_COGNITO_REGION $region && appshake set VUE_APP_COGNITO_USERPOOL_ID $userpoolId && appshake set VUE_APP_COGNITO_IDPOOL_ID $idpoolId && appshake set VUE_APP_COGNITO_CLIENT_ID clientId
